name: CleverBooks Space
description:
CleverBooks Space is a free mobile application empowered by Augmented Reality (controlled virtual reality through a mobile device and a marker). 

It covers engineering and space interactive Augmented Reality tasks for primary and secondary level kids.

It is designed to  enhance interest and curiosity levels in STEM, particularly focused on topics like astronomy, space exploration, and space technology. 

The areas covered: planets of the Solar system, space rocket assembling, functions of the SpaceX rocket parts, and selection of, space mission upon kid’s choice.

Optional:

We would really appreciate it if you could spend 5 minutes answering the following survey after using the app.

The app is currently being used in a Computer Games Technology MSc research study at City, University of London. It aims to investigate how Augmented Reality can impact STEM education and if it can improve pupils interest towards STEM. 

Please follow the link to participate in the research study.
